author: SAM McNEIL Associated Press
title: Wuhan farmers struggle as crops wither from travel limits
description: Chinese authorities are easing travel controls after declaring victory over the coronavirus, but flowers and some other crops that are deemed nonessential are withering while farmers wait for permission to move them to markets
content:
HUANGPI, China -- 
Stuck in the same bind as many other Chinese farmers whose crops are rotting in their fields, Jiang Yuewu is preparing to throw out a 500-ton harvest of lotus root because anti-coronavirus controls are preventing traders from getting to hi… [+3427 chars]
